front.title: The Resource Public Key Infrastructure (RPKI) to Router Protocol

abstract.t: In order to verifiably validate the origin Autonomous Systems and Autonomous System Paths of BGP announcements, routers need a simple but reliable mechanism to receive Resource Public Key Infrastructure (RFC 6480) prefix origin data and router keys from a trusted cache. This document describes a protocol to deliver validated prefix origin data and router keys to routers. This document describes version 1 of the rpki-rtr protocol.
